name: Plantstore – Gardening and Landscaping Template
description:
Plantstore – Figma Template is specially designed for every kind of : plants, decor, studio, flowers, garden, gardening, home plants, houseplants, interior design, landscaping, office plants and so on.Plant store can be a great choice for your online presence.

Looking for release your company website? This template is best choice.We have included best practice of web development – you can create great website layout based on Twitter Bootstrap or Grid 1170px.

Images in the main file are replaced by placeholders, all images used for demo purpose only. Don’t worry about elements, shapes, and graphics, it is already in your main file.

  • 100% Responsive
  • 02 Homepage
